Portfolio

Astro-bootstrap-wysiwyg

Astro-bootstrap-wysiwyg is a fork of the bootstrap-wysiwyg text editor by Mindmup that incorporates a font-based astrology icon set and a mobile-friendly UI with Font Awesome icons. The editor is used as a jQuery Plug-in. It was built specifically for responsive astrological content, but could easily be customized for any font-based icon set by providing additional or alternative font files in the assets of a project.

  • Live site: beaudavenport.github.io/bootstrap-wysiwyg
  • Github Repo: bootstrap-wysiwyg
  • First Commit: January 4, 2015
  • Most recent Commit: January 28, 2015

Inventory Helper

Inventory Helper is an application for calculating and saving coffee inventory in a roasting facility or coffee shop. It implements a REST-ful back-end with express.js and MongoDB, and a stateful front-end with backbone.js. The UI leverages bootstrap for responsive usability on any device. JSON web tokens are used for authentication and bcrypt for node is used for password hashing.

  • Live site: inventoryhelper.herokuapp.com
  • Github Repo: inventoryHelper
  • First Commit: July 4, 2014
  • Most recent Commit: October 8, 2014

STL Tap Report

STL Tap Report STL Tap Report is an informational database of craft beers local to the St. Louis area. It utilizes the ASP.NET MVC 4 framework for the back-end, with SQL Server database access using the Entity Framework. ASP.NET session state and hashed passwords are used for the login system.

  • Live site: stltapreport.azurewebsites.net
  • Github Repo: launchcodecsharp
  • First Commit: November 18, 2013
  • Most recent Commit: March 20, 2014
